scripts.minify:css: mkdir -p dist/assets/css && for file in src/assets/css/*.css; do npx clean-css-cli -o dist/assets/css/$(basename "$file") "$file"; done
scripts.minify:js: mkdir -p dist/assets/js && for file in src/assets/js/*.js; do npx terser "$file" -o dist/assets/js/$(basename "$file") -c -m; done
scripts.copy:html: cp -r src/pages/* dist/ && cp -r src/projects dist/ && cp -r src/assets/resumes dist/assets/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx live-server dist --port=3000
scripts.watch: npm run build && npx live-server dist --port=3000 --watch=src
